quote: Asleep, he looked a lot younger than going-on-seventeen, but I had noticed that Johnny looked younger when he was asleep too, so I figured everyone did. Maybe people are younger when they are asleep.
quote_letters: ASLEEP HE LOOKED A LOT YOUNGER THAN GOING-ON-SEVENTEEN BUT I HAD NOTICED THAT JOHNNY LOOKED YOUNGER WHEN HE WAS ASLEEP TOO SO I FIGURED EVERYONE DID MAYBE PEOPLE ARE YOUNGER WHEN THEY ARE ASLEEP
